mapper.select: SELECT chatTitle, chatContent, chatDate, chatNum, chatStatus, profilePicture, c.sendUserName FROM tbl_chat c left join tbl_profile p on c.sendUserName = p.userNum where c.userNum = #{userNum} order by 4 desc
select count(chatNum) from tbl_chat where userNum = #{userNum}
mapper.update: update tbl_chat set chatStatus= 1 where userNum= ${userNum} and chatStatus = 0
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_chat where userNum= ${userNum} and chatStatus = 0
select userName from tbl_user where userNum= ${userNum}
